this characteristic was successfully used in the Netherlands the par value of 10 Netherlands guilder banknote , variable from the silver-white color to blue , and then change to black .这一特点被成功地运用在了荷兰面值10荷兰盾的钞票上，颜色从银白变到蓝色，然后再变到黑色。

entry.tran: 荷兰盾（荷兰曾使用的货币单位，2002年为欧元所取代）
entry.def: A guilder was a unit of money that was used in the Netherlands. In 2002 it was replaced by the euro.

means.word_mean: 1. the basic unit of money in Suriname; equal to 100 cents
2. formerly the basic unit of money in the Netherlands; equal to 100 cents
